description: ENABLING ACTIVITIES FOR THE PREPARATION OF THE BAHAMAS’ SECOND NATIONAL COMMUNCIATION TO THE UNFCCC - PIMS 3212

subproject.description: The main components of the SNC project are: (a) assessment of potential impacts of climate change on the most vulnerable sectors, (b) preparation of an inventory of GHG in accordance with the UNFCCC, (c) identification of mitigation measures being undertaken, (d) identification of other information relevant to implementation of the UNFCCC, and preparation of a National Strategy and Action Plan to address climate change and its adverse impacts
subproject.title: Bahamas SNC to UNFCCC

title: Preparetion of SNC to UNFCCC for the Bahamas
